org.sd.cluster.config
Interface Clusterable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Job
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBatchWorkServer, AbstractCountingJob, AbstractJob, BatchWorkServer, BinaryOutputDataDescriptor, CountingJob, DataDescriptor, DataTransferWorkServer, EmptyJob, FilesetOutputDataDescriptor, GovernableJob, JobOutputProcessor, OldAbstractJob, OutputDataDescriptor, RedistributorWorkServer, ResultsConcatenationJob, ResultsProcessorJob, SteadyStateJob, TextOutputDataDescriptor, TriggerFindingJob, WorkJob, WorkServer, WorkServerClientJob, WorkServerClientWithOutputJob
public interface Clusterable

Interface for clusterable objects.

A clusterable object has a cluster context that is set by a NodeServer when it handles a message.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 ClusterContext getClusterContext()
          Get this clusterable's clusterContext.
 void setClusterContext(ClusterContext clusterContext)
          Set this clusterable's clusterContext.
 

Method Detail

setClusterContext

void setClusterContext(ClusterContext clusterContext)
Set this clusterable's clusterContext.

Note that this is not set until a cluster node's node server handles a message that uses this clusterable object and the message passes the context along to this clusterable object.

Parameters:
clusterContext - this object's clusterContext.

getClusterContext

ClusterContext getClusterContext()
Get this clusterable's clusterContext.

Returns:
this object's clusterContext.
